scripts.prepare:arbitrum: mustache config/arbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/arbitrum.json ./src/contracts.template.ts > ./src/contracts.ts
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-goerli: mustache config/arbitrum-goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/arbitrum-goerli.json ./src/contracts.template.ts > ./src/contracts.ts
scripts.prepare:base: mustache config/base.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/base.json ./src/contracts.template.ts > ./src/contracts.ts
